transfer_type.description: "Download" if the DNASC Globus endpoint is the source, else "Upload". Use task document property source_endpoint_id.

bytes_transferred.description: Current total number of bytes transferred. Use the value of task document property bytes_transferred.

transfer_size.description: Read from label property in the task document

progress_percentage.description: bytes_transfered / transfer_size * 100, rounded to nearest integer
